about_the_game:
A canteen simulation management game, where Xiao Qian and his parents accidentally stray to an island during an outing, eat the witch's food by mistake, and turn into pigs. They need to complete the witch's tasks to recover and leave.

Here, you can farm, build, cook, fish, and more, establishing the best restaurant on this magical island.

Here, you'll find guests from various worlds, each with unique taste preferences. Come and meet these distinct characters, and warmly welcome them with open arms.

Decorate your tavern:

Your dining hall can be decorated freely, with tables, chairs, and decorations arranged as you wish.

Hosting diverse guests:

Various customers visit, satisfying their diverse tastes can earn more money, and quickly rescue her parents.

Unlock recipes and create a variety of different delicacies:

There are dozens or even hundreds of recipes and wine plants in the game, so go crazy about manufacturing and managing them.

Suburban exploration:

There are various mysterious characters and events for you to explore here. You can run your tavern or go out and have conversations with them, maybe there will be different surprises.

Visit the witch on the island:

Remove Curse:

Everyone can add a wish list, the more wishes there are, the more game content will be.
